name: Traffic Trouble
description:
The very first game I designed in March 2006. It was created after I played the game Freeway on an Atari greatest hits compilation. I enjoyed that game so much that I wanted to make that my first little project. The game starts off easy enough, but every five succesful attempts at crossing the road results in more cars being added to the playfield. Includes a top ten score list saved locally to your c drive.

controls

W - Move up

S - Move down
